content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position (2.5, 1.5)
The lab is currently set up for research but is not receiving power.

### Electricity generator at position (-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (-11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at position (-11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (0, 0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)
- Burner mining drill at position (5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities. In this instance, the agent failed to connect the boiler to the offshore pump due to a lack of necessary items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
